dataSet.title: right-angle-triangle
dataSet:
**Some common ratio of Right Angle Triangle :**
  1. S:S:S$\sqrt 2$
  2. S:S$\sqrt 3$:2S where S is opposite side of 30Â°
  3. 3:4:5
  4. 5:12:13
  5. 7:24:25
  6. 8:15:17
  7. 9:40:41
  8. 11:60:61
Area of Equilateral Triangle with a Circle inscribed inside whose radius is$r$ is $3\sqrt{3}r^2$
